daily.title: Morning Stretch
daily.description: Complete a 10-minute morning stretch routine to increase flexibility.

daily.description: Walk at least 10,000 steps today to improve cardiovascular health.

daily.title: Hydration Hero
daily.description: Drink at least 8 glasses of water throughout the day.

weekly.title: Meal Prep Master
